---------------

### Tender Announcement

**Procurement Name:** Rental of LED Video Screens and Related Equipment
**Procurement Number:** cb-4176-2771113

### Overview

The Department of Canadian Heritage (PCH) invites offers from qualified suppliers to provide various LED video screen packages under Standing Offer Agreements for events and celebrations in the National Capital Region (NCR). The proposed contract is expected to commence on April 24, 2023, with an estimated completion date of March 31, 2025.

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive, Traditional Request for Standing Offer
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Procurement Category:** Services (SRV)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Offer Requirements

The Department of Canadian Heritage is seeking Standing Offer Agreements for the following LED video screen package categories:

* Audio and visual presentation and composing equipment
* Projection screens or displays

Offerors may submit an Offer for one or multiple categories.

### Tender Documents

Tender documents can be accessed on the Canada Buys website (https://canadabuys.canada.ca). Interested offerors must register and log in to access the tender notice and associated documents.

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions regarding this Request for Standing Offer, please contact:
Nicole Sabourin
contrats-contracting@pch.gc.ca
(819) 271-7204

### Tender Closing Date

Tenders must be submitted by April 6, 2023, at 14:00:00 EST.

### Attachment

The tender notice and associated documents can be accessed through the following links:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4176/10222674_rfso_en.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4176/10222674_rfso_fr.pdf
